Kevin Cotellesso

Compliant Gripper Finger Design

Mechanical Design / 2025

About this Project

(See Articulated Compliant Gripper for shared design methodology)

This project focuses on the design of compliant fingers for robotic gripping applications, utilizing the same alternate design methodology for compliant mechanisms that mimic rigid-body mechanisms.


Relevant Skills

  • 3D Printing
  • Mechanism Design
